dublin_core.dcvalue: Education mediated by technology facilitates the access to information and can reach more people including a broader range of socio economic groups and ages and at a low cost The website Babies Portal Speech Language Pathology Audiology and Dentistry http portaldosbebes fob usp br was developed to provide parents with information on communication procedure disorders and oral health enabling them to prevent and identify any changes in development early while looking for the best treatment
Journal of applied oral science : revista FOB
Website Babies Portal: development and evaluation of the contents regarding orofacial functions.
